title: Mushroom, spinach and cheese pie
ingredients: ['325g chopped onions', '4 cloves garlic, minced', '60ml olive oil', '425g fresh mushrooms, sliced', '300g spinach - rinsed, stemmed and dried', '3 eggs', '375g ricotta cheese', '150g grated Parmesan cheese', '230ml soured cream', '50g dried breadcrumbs', '4 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley', '125g butter, melted', '1 packet filo pastry', '2 teaspoons sesame seeds']
